CONTACT.TITLE: Contact?
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: You can contact us by Social Media or our contact form.
CONTACT.SOCIALDESCRIPTION: You can know our day-to-day work in our Social Media accounts

EMAIL.LABEL: Email
EMAIL.INVALID: You should introduce a valid Email.

SUBJECT.LABEL: Subject
SUBJECT.PLACEHOLDER: Why do you want to contact us?
SUBJECT.POPULATED: I'm interesting in adopt a dog

MESSAGE.LABEL: Message
MESSAGE.POPULATED: Hi! I would like to adopt {{value}}. Could yo contact me to follow next steps? Thanks!

SUCCESS.TITLE: Thanks for your message!
SUCCESS.SUBTITLE: WeÂ´ll try to contact you asap!

FAILED.TITLE: Oops, something is wrong
FAILED.SUBTITLE: Please, contact us by email or social media

TEAMING.TITLE: You can join our Teaming Group
TEAMING.MESSAGE: Teaming of el Refugio de Leo

RECYCLE.TITLE: Bring what you don't need
RECYCLE.MESSAGE: Blanquets, towels, cushions, mattresses, we can reuse whatever similar thing as well :)

SHELTER.TITLE: You can shelter a dog
SHELTER.MESSAGE: Shelter at home one of our dogs while we find a family for them, it will be very happy and it will adapt to its new family very soon.

ADOPT.TITLE: Adopt!
ADOPT.MESSAGE: That's the best thing that can happen :)
